local VERAFLUX_SID = "urn:livehouse-automation:serviceId:VeraFlux1"
function startFluxCapacitor(lul_device) luup.log("VeraFlux plugin: loading library L_VeraFlux1 ...") if (package.path:find ("/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua", 1, true) == nil) then package.path = package.path .. ";/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua" end
package.loaded.L_VeraFlux1 = nil VeraFlux = require("L_VeraFlux1") if (package.loaded.L_VeraFlux1 == nil) then luup.log("VeraFlux plugin: plugin is not installed correctly. Library L_VeraFlux1 cannot be loaded.", 1) luup.task("Plugin not correctly installed", 2, "VeraFlux plugin", -1) return false end
luup.log("VeraFlux plugin: library L_VeraFlux1 loaded") -- define pointers(?) to the timer and callback functions in the library veraFluxOnTimer = VeraFlux.veraFluxOnTimer veraFluxSetupCallbacks = VeraFlux.veraFluxSetupCallbacks return VeraFlux.main(lul_device) end
